ComicInfo.Title: Switch; Strangers on a Train; Performance
ComicInfo.Summary:
Casotto does it again! How far will a bored housewife go to attract the attention of her husband? How about joining an Asian sex circus? Also: a businessman dreams of beautiful lesbians on a train. Beautiful art by Italian erotic comics' most curvaceous artist -- you do know she uses herself for a model, right?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:12:45. [CVDB238992]
